summary: Provides an asynchronous client that wraps the Blockchain.com exchange REST API, exposing methods to retrieve market data, account balances, order books, and trade history, as well as to create, modify, cancel orders and handle deposits and withdrawals, with automatic request signing and comprehensive error handling.
business_intent: Allow developers to programmatically access and trade on the Blockchain.com cryptocurrency exchange in an asynchronous environment, facilitating automated trading, portfolio monitoring, and fund management.
